full_text: ENGLISH below Would you like a two-color poinsettia? In the video on YouTube I show you step by step how I knit the stars. Material: Sunday from Sandnes, running length 235m/50 g, needle size 2.5, consumption for a complete star about 5 g per color Filling cotton or leftover wool Needle set or long circular knitting needle Scissors and sewing needle English information: Hi! Unfortunately the video tutorial is only in German. However, if you activate English subtitles on YouTube I am sure you will be able to knit the star! Feel free to comment any questions under the video in YouTube and I am happy to help with anything you can not figure out.
name: Ravelry: Weihnachtsstern pattern by Sarah Stosno
